text: Hi Everyone, Im trying to Hide from Blog section the summary module, I already entered one HTML code to the header section and the changes has been applied...but without updates at my blog section, you guys know whatÂ´s wrong here?

hi <@U079WQ6M0KY>,
<http://module.XYZ|module.XYZ> is working only in modules.

What you could try is the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context|export_to_template_context >but I think it won't work neither.

How about putting this module just in like `{% module 'blog_summary' path="../../../module_name.module", label="Show summary" %}` into your blog template and trigger it from there?

Another option could be (if you  want it to be global and have access to it) edit the fields.json of your theme and add a simple boolean to it like

```{
            "name": "show_summary",
            "label": "Show summary in blog",
            "required": false,
            "locked": false,
            "type": "boolean",
            "inline_help_text": "",
            "help_text": "",
            "default": false 
}```
Then you could try something like
```{% if theme.show_summary %}
...
{% endif %}```
in your head HTML area (screenshot)
